entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:25 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 01:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of freezing rain beginning early this evening then changing to periods of drizzle near midnight. Fog patches. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Fog late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow overnight. Fog dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
